description:
-- Update 2/3/11 fixes stream URL.

An unofficial app to listen to KKJZ on your webOS device.

--KKJZ is public radio so if you like the music consider donating with the '$ pledge' link or by tapping the Help group in the help scene.

--Tap the 'Refresh' icon to update the playlist.

--Tap the 'playlist' link to open the playlist scene.

--In the playlist tap a list item to search for it in the Amazon MP3 app.

--Tap the 'schedule' link to open the program schedule on jazzandblues.org.

--Tap the 'hosts' link to open the hosts page on jazzandblues.org.

--From the help menu tap the Developer group to support this app.

--From the help menu tap the Support group to email the developer.

--Check out the sounds of Blue Ears Blues by tapping 'Play Blue Ears' in the application menu.

--"KKJZ 88.1 & Global Jazz are committed to the promotion and preservation of the rich cultural heritages of jazz and blues through engaging, inspiring and informative programming that satisfies the most dedicated jazz and blues aficionados while attracting newcomers of all ages."
